license.grantOfLicenseText: By downloading this resource, you agree to comply with the terms of the {license} license.
license.personalCommercialUse: You may use this resource for personal and commercial projects
license.modifyAdapt: You may modify and adapt the resource for your needs
license.provideAttribution: You must provide appropriate attribution when required
license.noRedistribution: You may not redistribute the original files without permission
license.noOwnershipClaim: You may not claim ownership of the original work
license.commercialPermissions: Commercial use may require additional permissions
license.asIsWarranty: This resource is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.
license.noLiability: The publisher is not liable for any damages arising from use of this resource.
license.terminationText: This license terminates automatically if you violate any terms.
license.terminationAction: Upon termination, you must cease all use and delete all copies.
license.acceptanceText: By clicking "Accept", you acknowledge that you have read and agree to these terms.

contentStandards.title: Documents: Content Access Standards
contentStandards.description: This document explains standards for accessing content in files. Please follow the guidelines below for each category

verseUsage.title: Verse Usage Standards
verseUsage.description: To access verses, follow the following standards
verseUsage.guideline3: Verify latest updates in verse database
verseUsage.exampleText: Example: To access verse 2:255, use getVerse('2:255')

wordsUsage.title: Words Usage Standards
wordsUsage.description: To access words, commit to the following
wordsUsage.exampleText: Example: To retrieve the word "الله", use getWord("الله")

tafsirUsage.title: Tafsir Usage Standards
tafsirUsage.description: When accessing tafsir, follow the following guidelines
tafsirUsage.guideline3: Verify existence of updated interpretations for tafsir
tafsirUsage.exampleText: Example: To access tafsir for verse 2:255, use getTafsir('2:255')

contentStandards.footer: © Content Standards for 2023, All rights reserved
